subject: TCO Round 4
body:
Hello sm1lies,

The final online round of the Algorithm Competition of the TopCoder(R) Open, sponsored by AOL(R) has arrived!  Be there to witness it! Login to the applet to chat with the competitors and see some of the best coding take place.  Round 4 will be held Saturday, April 28, at 1:00 PM EDT (GMT/UTC -4).  

***********************************************************************
Think you're the best?

Prove your coding skills in the world's biggest, most lucrative competition: the global financial markets.  

DRW is seeking TopCoder's best to engineer algorithmic trading systems.  We'll give you state-of-the-art technology and funding.  You'll give us innovative, high-performance code to beat Wall Street in the world's highest stakes game. 

Show us you have what it takes.
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=tournaments&d2=tco07&d3=sponsorspatrons&d4=drw

***********************************************************************

Don't miss the excitement of Round 4 of the TCO, and remember to compete in the next SRM on Tuesday, May 1 at 7:00 AM EDT (GMT/UTC -4).

Best of luck to you in the Arena!

- The TopCoder Competitions Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder competitions.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, log in to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
